params.question:
Given a matrix mat with dimensions 3x4, what will be the result of applying the apply function with MARGIN = 1 and a custom function sum?

mat <- matrix(1:12, nrow = 3, ncol = 4)
result <- apply(mat, MARGIN = 1, FUN = sum)

params.question:
What will be the output of the following sapply call?

x <- list(a = 1:3, b = 4:6, c = 7:9)

result <- sapply(x, FUN = function(v) length(v) > 2)

params.question:
What will be the output of the tapply function when applied to a numeric vector values using a factor vector factor_var?

values <- c(10, 20, 30, 40, 50)
factor_var <- factor(c("A", "B", "A", "B", "A"))
result <- tapply(values, factor_var, FUN = mean)
